mapper.insert: insert into order_item (id , order_id, product_id, sku_id, batch_id, trip_id, create_time, update_time, is_deleted) values (#{id}, #{orderId}, #{productId}, #{skuId}, #{batchId}, #{tripId}, now(), now(), 0)
mapper.update: update order_item set order_status = #{orderStatus}, update_time = now() where order_id = #{orderId}
mapper.select: select oi.id, oi.order_id, oi.product_id, oi.sku_id, oi.batch_id, oi.trip_id, oi.create_time, oi.update_time, oi.is_deleted, oi.check_status, ti.name as trip_name, ti.id_card_no as trip_card_no, ti.sex, ti.age_type from order_item oi left join trip_info ti on oi.trip_id = ti.id where oi.order_id = #{orderId} and oi.is_deleted = 0 order by id desc
select oi.trip_id from order_item oi where oi.batch_id = #{batchId} and oi.order_status in (1, 3, 16) and oi.is_deleted = 0 order by id desc
